experience.title: Remote IT Support Specialist
duties: Remotely troubleshoot and maintain hardware (desktops, laptops, printers) and software (Windows, MS Office, Adobe, iOS) for over 300 employees.
Test, implement and maintain over 200 devices via remote Mobile Device Management and Endpoint Encryption systems.
Create instructional manuals for end users and IT support employees.
Create BYOD, mobile device security and laptop security policies.
Set up and maintain Active Directory, email (Exchange | Office 365) and Cisco UCM profiles for new employees.
Set up monthly phishing training campaigns for over 100 users in KnowBe4.
Participate in PCI DSS and HiTrust certification projects for enterprise clients.

experience.title: Sales and Customer Service Representative
duties: Spoke to over 50 clients a day providing excellent customer service.
Calculated cost based on customer inventory.
Executed detailed documentation of all activities performed from start to end of each sale.
Collaborated closely with team members to identify ways of improving performance.
